1 \defgroup introduction Introduction
2 
3 \details
4 
5 [OnixS](https://www.onixs.biz) **ultra-low latency C++ B3 Binary Order Entry Handler** is a C++ class library
6 that encapsulates the
7 [B3 Binary Order Entry protocol for the PUMA Trading System](https://www.b3.com.br/en_us/solutions/platforms/puma-trading-system/for-developers-and-vendors/entrypoint/).
8 
9 \section main-features Main Features
10 
11 - Ultra-low latency access to the B3 PUMA Trading System order entry gateway.
12 - Easy-to-use API.
13 - Fault Tolerance.
14 - Multiple Threading Models.
15 - Message Gap Detection and Retransmission Handling.
16 - Session Scheduling.
17 - Flexible Logging.
18 - Pre-Certified.
19 
20 \section services Services
21 
22 The Handler provides the following services:
23 
24 - Manages network connections.
25 - Implements Session Security/Authentication.
26 - Supports FIX Simple Binary Encoding (SBE), delivering faster encoding/decoding.
27 - Supports FIXP Performance (FIXP) session management point-to-point session layer protocol.
28 - Manages the FIXP application layer (defines business-related data content).
29 - Creates (outgoing) SBE messages.
30 - Parses (incoming) SBE messages.
31 - Persists messages and session state.
32 - Recovers the FIXP session state after restarting.
33 - Detects the telecommunication link failures and reconnects automatically.
34 - Supports Solarflare Onload Application Accelerator Extensions APIs to ensure the lowest possible latency and minimal jitter.
35
